Summary: videoing large airplane UFO coming by the other airplane crossing it's contrail
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Monterey
There were no other sightings in Monterey on or around March 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was videoing at the Monterey beach around 7pm on 20 March. there was a large earthquake today in Mexico around noon time it was a 7.4 in size therefore It was time to be on the look out for weird things and sure enough as I'm videoing this large airplane, around 7:55pm coming from the West over the Monterey Bay going East. 3 minutes into videoing the airiplane a UFO came out from the South. The large airplane had it's typical contrail, about 16 sec.later the UFO crossed through the airplanes contrail and keep going North. I tryed to zoom in at different times during my videoing of the UFO it lasted over 5 minutes. Same night around 8:15pm. a second UFO came into view coming from the South --South-West area going North this went on for about 4 minutes. Then another UFO coming from the same direction going North by North-East. All of this was exciting to watch not sure if they were airplanes or not. they did'nt make any major changes like the other videos I have over the months. Trying to get my videos together for MUFON to review before I release then to the public...Maybe with MUFON--sorry but this is going into my book-etc... Maybe I will put one of my ufo videos onto my website.
